act: Local Audit (Public Access to Documents) Act 2017
section_title: Inspection of accounting records by journalists and citizen journalists
section_text: 1 1 Section 26 of the Local Audit and Accountability Act 2014 (inspection of documents  etc ) is amended as follows. 2 In subsection (1) (persons who can inspect accounting records and related documents) after  “persons interested” insert  “                or any journalist              ” . 3 After that subsection insert— 1A In subsection (1)  “ journalist ” means any person who produces for publication journalistic material (whether paid to do so or otherwise).

act: Local Audit (Public Access to Documents) Act 2017
section_text: 2 1 This Act comes into force at the end of the period of 2 months beginning with the day on which this Act is passed. 2 This Act extends to England and Wales only. 3 This Act may be cited as the Local Audit (Public Access to Documents) Act 2017.
